Posts.Content: Jun 13, 2009 01:53PM o2bhealthyhusbum wrote: My wife is going to have a Bilat in 10 days with reconstruction happening at the same time, in stages of course.  I cannot tell you how helpful this list will be as I am "in charge" of getting things that she might need.  Thank you!
Posts.Title: More Tips (and a Shopping List) for Getting Through Chemo rock MinusTwo
